summary: Applies masking augmentations to audio spectrograms, either by zero‑out vertical/horizontal strips (SpecAugment) or by zero‑out rectangular patches (SpecCutout), configurable via mask counts and size limits.
business_intent: Enhance the robustness and generalization of speech or audio recognition models by artificially diversifying training spectrograms, reducing overfitting and improving performance on varied acoustic conditions.
